metadata.Title: CVE-2022-46285 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in libXpm. This issue occurs when parsing a file with acomment not closed; the end-of-file condition will not be detected, leadingto an infinite loop and resulting in a Denial of Service in the applicationlinked to the library.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-46285` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxpm4 - 1:3.5.12-1ubuntu0.18.04.2
xpmutils - 1:3.5.12-1ubuntu0.18.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxpm package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:3.5.12-1ubuntu0.18.04.2').
motif package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
